Name: Florentino
description:
This borrower lives with his family and works and earns his main income from farming. The borrower grows coffee; it is good quality coffee because he looks after it well and is then able to sell it at an excellent price. The borrower is very responsible with the crops and likes to look after them well.

The borrower is applying for this loan in order to buy fertilisers and manure and thereby have a good yield.

The borrower is happy with the friendly and good service from Prisma and Kiva. He is very grateful for the support provided.

The borrower's dream is to have a good yield.

January 2023
